title: Anyone else experience horrific on and off again lag between 10 pm and 11 pm?
body:
Northern California so wherever the hell the closest server to that is, Texas right?

I dont know if its league or my provider throttling me but It goes away virtually the second i rage quit league.
It has been happening every night for the last 2-3 weeks and im actually furious with it.

Before i scream bloody murder and threaten to switch to comcast, id like to rule out riot servers as a possibility.

replies.body:
If you're only seeing issues during specific times, it's entirely possible your ISP is rerouting network traffic during specific hours to mitigate network congestion. You can confirm this by using a VPN ([Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) & [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) are good options) to connect to League during the hours you normally experience the issue, as the VPN will reroute your connection and avoid any ISP changes to your route. 

Let me know the results of this test.
